'''Isembard Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Isembard was the seventh child of [[Gerontius Took]] and [[Adamanta Chubb]]. He had one son, [[Flambard Took]], born in {{SR|1287}}.<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The name means "iron battle-axe" (''isen + bard'').<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
